TopicTitle: Cannot click a modded part once placed

Articles.Content:
I've been working on a BDArmory expansion.  All but one of the parts I modeled work fine in game.  One part in particular, however, does not.  It appears to be an issue with the model exported from unity.  

I've rewritten the .cfg 3 times, checked that it works with part models fabricated prior to the issue, and tried making new models after the fact.  None of the new models work.  

Has anyone ever experienced this problem?  I suspect it has to do with either an oversight on my part in Unity or a bug with part tools. 

Please for the love of god send a rescue craft.
Solved.  I needed a convex collider with <256 faces
